LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowHideUnwillingTooltip: Exclude all items trader is unwilling to buy.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowEnableGhostButtonsToo: Improve performance by only showing trade buttons near the cursor.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowRememberSortingsToolt: Save column sortings in mod configurations.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowEnableBulkDurabilityT: Show averaged durability for stacked items in durability column.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowAutoRefocusTooltip: Attempts to retain focus on input field when unfocused by changing interface.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowOpenAsDefaultTooltip: Use as default trade window. The non-default window can be opened by holding down Ctrl as the window opens.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowPauseAfterTradeToolti: Keeps the game paused after trade window is closed.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowShowAvailableOnMapToo: Show total available on map if different from what is available for trade in Available column.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowAlternatingRowColorsT: Enable to have a slightly alternating background color per row.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowDynamicButtonsTooltip: When enabled, invalid buttons are hidden.
LanguageData.ConfigurationWindowRowFontTooltip: Changes the font size of the trade window rows.
